greetings.hello: Hello! How can I assist you? You can ask about a disease, its symptoms, or recommended medicines.
greetings.hi: Hi there! Ask me about diseases, medicines, or symptoms for detailed information.
greetings.how are you: I'm here to help you with medical-related queries. How can I assist you today?

Fungal infection.description: A fungal infection is caused by fungi that can affect the skin, nails, or other body areas.

Allergy.description: An allergy occurs when your immune system reacts to a foreign substance.
precautions: Avoid outdoor activities during high pollen levels

Diabetes.description: Diabetes is a chronic condition that affects how your body processes blood sugar (glucose).
diet: Consume fiber-rich foods like vegetables and whole grains
workout: Cardio exercises like walking or cycling

Common Cold.description: A common cold is a viral infection that affects the upper respiratory tract.
diet: Drink warm fluids like tea or soup
Consume foods rich in Vitamin C, like oranges
precautions: Avoid close contact with infected individuals

Clotrimazole cream.usage: Apply to the affected area twice daily for fungal infections.
side_effects: Redness at the site of application

Cetirizine.usage: Take one tablet daily for allergy relief.

Metformin.usage: Take with meals to control blood sugar levels.

Paracetamol.usage: Take one tablet every 6 hours to reduce fever and pain.

Amlodipine.usage: Take one tablet daily to manage high blood pressure.

symptom_info.Itching: Itching can be caused by allergies, insect bites, or fungal infections. Maintain good hygiene and consult a doctor if it persists.
symptom_info.Sneezing: Sneezing is often caused by allergies or colds. Avoid allergens and use antihistamines if necessary.
symptom_info.Increased thirst: Increased thirst is a common symptom of diabetes or dehydration. Drink plenty of water and consult a doctor if it persists.
symptom_info.Cough: A cough can indicate a common cold, flu, or respiratory infection. Use cough syrup for relief and consult a doctor if it persists.
symptom_info.Dizziness: Dizziness can result from low blood pressure, dehydration, or vertigo. Rest and hydrate, and consult a doctor if it persists.

intents.fallback: I'm sorry, I couldn't understand that. Please ask about a disease, medicine, or symptom for detailed information.
